alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Erath and southeastern Palo Pinto Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Morgan Mill, or 20 miles north of Stephenville, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Patillo and Santo. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 372 and 384. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
